attributes.action: go ahead with road toll plans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I see that 1.8 million people have signed your anti-toll petition for road taxing. I would like to be able to present the other side of the argument and represent the growing number of people who feel that traveling should be paid for in this way. I would like to create this petition to support your plans for road tolls. It is a necessary step in the reduction of greenhouse gases.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
